title: Total softwood production in Canada 2021
summary: This line graph shows the Total softwood production in cubic metres of Canada in 2021 .
production starts at approximately 1370 cubic metres during January , after which a moderate increase can be observed until reaching about 1580 in March .
production remains steady at 1450 during April and May , after which the maximum production is achieved in June with 1600 cubic metres .
gold: The line chart depicts the total softwood production in Canada in 2021 . The production alternates a lot throughout the year . It generally increases from January to March , reaching its peak at 5500 thousand cubic metres .
